cause.description:
When you join this cause, you will be supporting the hungry and poverty stricken children of the world. Every day, go to http://www.hungersite.com and click the rather large button that says "HELP FEED THE HUNGRY." Every time you click this button, a small amount of food is going to be given to a child that hasn't eaten in days or even weeks. Please do this for the kids, as well as yourself. By showing your support to this cause, you will have shown these people how much you care! And Another thing...every time you click the button, IT'S FREE!
1. Hunger is a core problem on Earth today.
2. Every man, woman, and child suffering from hunger needs to be helped by those people who are more fortunate.
3. Anyone can do it...so WHY NOT?!
cause.mission: To feed the hungry and less fortunate children of the world, no matter how impossible it seems!
cause.name: Fight Hunger Through The Hunger Site
